topic.title: Hey Guys! New here on ZeroNet.
topic.body: Any suggestions what to do and what to look at and what to try? :D

1607119283_14TyEpikmsMtpR9pRfqzVGvoWHN3Y.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_2751_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Stay away from the chans except for Millchan Engine, because of illegal content.

I am not sure what is that, but small explanation would help? :D, Alright just got rough explanations about what is that. Alright thanks!

> [styromaniac](#comment_2752_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): CP. Need I say more?

Oh.. Ehm, never gonna go there then.
